title: johnsaributua
author: johnsaributua
content: I initially tried to install utopia app on my android.I was curious about the campaign organized, I tried to download, register and explore with ai, I was amazed by what I found and amazed at satoshi, how could I not?Here is my answer, I found mr sathosi also active here https://www.metzdowd.com/pipermail/cryptography/ .The thread is neatly threaded, the data is in-depth and the activity is really very fascinating. check this out, this is just a part for example,,  I love to go on adventures from day to day, this is the first time I am happy with my own steps, I realize from now on that happiness comes from small things or new things that are obtained even though many people may already know, are you the same? New experiences can come from anyone without knowing rank, academic education even gender and profession.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: You are totally right that we should not limit ourselves to something by saying that we might not gain anything from it. You joined the Utopia campaign, and to make a review, chatted with the AI bot, and then came to know about the Cryptography Mailing list. This was before this forum, that's why that chat stated in its reply, translation is: QuoteSatoshi Nakamoto, the creator of Bitcoin, does not have his own official forum. However, Satoshi Nakamoto actively communicated with the Bitcoin community through a cryptography message board called "The Cryptography Mailing List" in 2008 and early 2009. There, he discussed and detailed his ideas and concepts about Bitcoin to people interested in cryptography and digital currency. After the launch of Bitcoin in 2009, Satoshi Nakamoto gradually disappeared from the community and public communication, so his identity and real existence remain mysterious to this day.As you can read, it says, it was used before any forums. He shared the idea of p2p bitcoin in that mailing list in around Fri Oct 31 17:33:09 EDT 2008You learned about the mailing list and shared it with us, and now I have come to know about it too. https://medium.com/xische-reports/birth-of-bitcoin-9fb451e00886
